titleInfo.title: Country-Western Show with Jimmy Martin at the Rajha Theaters

mods.abstract: One color window card (split fountain, red to black, on white) announcing a Country-Western Show with Jimmy Martin, Marty Martel, Jack Barlow, Nancy Dee, and Buddy Durham at the Rajhe theater on June 28. Poster features a metal photoplate of Jimmy Martin, Marty Martel, Nancy Dee and Buddy Durham.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
